level.heading: Coordination of procurement and use.
level.text: Each hospital in the District of Columbia shall enter into agreements or affiliations with procurement organizations for coordination of procurement and use of anatomical gifts.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-145, see notes following ยง 7-1531.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 15 of the Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act (2006). See Vol. 8A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
